: : Rodimus Prime : :

After quite an extensive journey, Rodimus and Nightlight arrive at the crash site of their former ship.

Rodimus transformes to his robot form.

Rodimus Prime: This is a good place to start tracking her signal. I doubt the pod fell too far from the ship.


Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
The femme trasnformer to her beast form (Fuzzor: Black Phanter, hawk) and followed Rodimus
